mapper.insert: INSERT INTO formlspol( grpcontno, grppolno, contno, polno, proposalno, prtno, conttype, poltypeflag, mainpolno, masterpolno, kindcode, riskcode, riskversion, managecom, agentcom, #{operator}, #{makedate}, #{maketime}, #{modifydate}, #{modifytime} )
